vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐκδημ-έω,
to be abroad, to be on one's travels, [Refs 5th c.BC+]; to be in exile, [Refs 5th c.BC+]
__II with accusative, travel through, δύσιν καὶ ἀνατολήν [Refs]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to be away, absent
primarily to be absent from home, go abroad, travel; hence, to be absent from, away from any place or person, 2Cor. 5:6, 8, 9*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: alejarse de la casa, estar ausente ; dejar la casa
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
1) 離開, 脫離 (林後 5:8)
2) (喻意) 離開 (林後 5:6,9)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
1) 离开, 脱离 (林后 5:8)
2) (喻意) 离开 (林后 5:6,9)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: khiếm diện; ra khỏi; được hoặc sống ở nước ngoài, xa
